title: A video.
description: Holds attributes of an ANS video component.

duration.description: Runtime of the video in milliseconds.

transcript.description: A transcript of the contents of the video.

rating.description: A rating of the video, to be used for appropriate age/content warnings.

video_type.description: The type of video (e.g. clip, livestream, etc)

youtube_content_id.description: The YouTube ID of the content, if (re)hosted on youtube.com

streams.description: The different streams this video can play in.

promo_image.description: A promo/leader image to the video.
